sentences.sContent: Currie added that leafcutter ants are the subject of thousands of papers authored over the last century, “yet this critical aspect of their success was completely unknown.”
sentences.sContent_eng: Currie added that leafcutter ants are the subject of thousands of papers authored over the last century, “yet this critical aspect of their success was completely unknown.”
sentences.sCn: 库里补充道：切叶蚁上个世纪以来数千页作品的主角。 但是到目前为止它们成功的重要一面还完全未被人所知。
